// <auto-generated by Crisp Source Generator/>
#nullable enable

using Crisp.Runtime.Nodes;

namespace TestApp;

partial class ParallelAI
{
    public partial Crisp.Runtime.BtNode Build()
    {
        return new SequenceNode(
            new ParallelNode(new Crisp.Runtime.ParallelPolicy.Any(),
                new ActionNode(() => this.SearchForEnemy()),
                new ActionNode(() => this.ListenForSound()),
                new ActionNode(() => this.CheckRadar())),
            new ParallelNode(new Crisp.Runtime.ParallelPolicy.All(),
                new ActionNode(() => this.AimAtTarget(this.Target)),
                new ActionNode(() => this.ChargeWeapon())),
            new ParallelNode(new Crisp.Runtime.ParallelPolicy.N(2),
                new ActionNode(() => this.NotifyAlly(this.Ally1)),
                new ActionNode(() => this.NotifyAlly(this.Ally2)),
                new ActionNode(() => this.NotifyAlly(this.Ally3))),
            new ActionNode(() => this.ExecuteAttack()));
    }
}
